thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Gabor

author: Gabor
title: Gabor
text: OK, I'll be honest, I was more than a little wary of ordering from this company because of the bad Yelp reviews. But I took the plunge and it paid off for me. Genuine Oakley progressive glasses, delivered way before I expected them using international priority overnight mail. Everything is in order, I have no complaints and I saved over 50% from what I would have paid locally. What's not to like?
